meanings.sent1: The babyproofed crib had soft edges to protect the baby.
meanings.sent2: The babyproofed outlet covers prevented any accidents.
meanings.sent3: The babyproofed room was like a cozy nest for the little one.
meanings.sent4: Her love was a babyproofed shield, keeping him from harm.
meanings.sent5: The babyproofed toys were colorful and sturdy, perfect for tiny hands.

meanings.definition: To make something safe for babies.
meanings.sent1: She babyproofed the cabinets by locking them securely.
meanings.sent2: Parents often babyproof their homes before the baby starts crawling.
meanings.sent3: He babyproofed the room so well, even the cat couldn't knock things over.
meanings.sent4: Her words babyproofed his heart against any doubts.
meanings.sent5: The parents babyproofed the staircase with a safety gate to prevent falls.

meanings.definition: The act of making something safe for babies.
meanings.sent1: Babyproofing is essential for creating a safe environment for infants.
meanings.sent2: The babyproofing of the nursery was complete with corner guards and outlet plugs.
meanings.sent3: The babyproofing of the playground made it a haven for toddlers to play safely.
meanings.sent4: His meticulous babyproofing turned the house into a child-friendly paradise.
meanings.sent5: The babyproofing service offered a thorough inspection to ensure every corner was safe for little ones.
